definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on

sentences.english: The successful development of private colleges depends on its good ope rational mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 民辦高校的順利發展有賴於自身運行機制的完善。

sentences.english: In some instances, human interaction with technology is required for the artwork to come into being.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情況下，人機交互技術有賴於藝術去實現。

sentences.english: But the red effect depends on the context.
sentences.chinese: 但紅色的影響有賴於環境的改變。

sentences.english: Definitive diagnosis depends upon either endoscopy or radiology .
sentences.chinese: 肯定的診斷有賴於放射學或內腔鏡檢查。

sentences.english: Rosoff told the meeting that the Council's legitimacy depends on its reform.
sentences.chinese: 羅塞夫在會上指出，安理會的合法性有賴於它的改革。

sentences.english: Cultural consciousnesses among all Chinese people determine the practice of Chinese Traditional Learning.
sentences.chinese: 而實踐國學思想，有賴於全民的文化自覺。

sentences.english: The publication of elaborate books owes a lot to the compilation of high-quality contents.
sentences.chinese: 精品圖書的出版有賴於精品內容的組織。

sentences.english: Great design relies on an open dialogue between the artist and the medium.
sentences.chinese: 優質的設計有賴於設計師與媒介的自由開放的溝通。

sentences.english: This builds your calves and sculpts your butt.
sentences.chinese: 這有賴於你的小腿和造型你的屁股。

sentences.english: Thus, CMS lines are needed to improve insect pest resistance in hybrid rice.
sentences.chinese: 因此，雜交稻抗蟲性的提高有賴於不育系的改良。

sentences.english: Agricultural success depends on the land resource and climate conditions.
sentences.chinese: 農業成功有賴於土地資源和氣候條件。

sentences.english: The development of carbohydrate-based drugs depends on the establishment of carbohydrate library.
sentences.chinese: 糖藥物的發展有賴於糖庫的建立。

sentences.english: More than half of modern culture depend on what one shall not read .
sentences.chinese: 現代文化的一半以上，有賴於不應讀的東西。

sentences.english: This procedure relies on the assumption of precise visual memory.
sentences.chinese: 這種程序有賴於準確的視覺記憶這一假設。

sentences.english: They will rely upon IA to help provide that assurance.
sentences.chinese: 這有賴於內審師來提供這種保證。

sentences.english: Efficient markets and fair competition depend on access to reliable data and information.
sentences.chinese: 高效的市場和公平的競爭有賴於可靠信息數據的獲取。
